Key Match Events: Scotty Pippen Jr. delivered a double-double performance with 14 points, 10 assists, 4 rebounds, 1 steal, and 1 block in the Memphis Grizzlies' 126-123 loss to the Chicago Bulls.
Post-Match Reflections: Larsa Pippen reacted positively to her son Scotty Pippen Jr.'s performance, sharing her pride and celebrating his efforts on Instagram.
